channel.title: Need help to make items to where u can wear them(and others)
channel.description: how do i make it where i can wear items? i can wear bronze pick and i changed it to a dharok axe but it still does same attk as pick,and plus,does anyone know the code for ambasyll whip??plus can you tell me how to make it where you can buy and sell to npcs?TY

item.title: Need help to make items to where u can wear them(and others)
item.dc:creator: @demonkilla demonkilla
item.description:
@demonkilla wrote:

TY and now alls i really need to know is how to make it where u can wear items and sell and buy from shops[br][size=1]Posted at: September 07, 2006, 03:46:00 PM[/size][hr]i keep typing ::pickup and ::item and the id,but it doesnt spawn any items, how do i make it, i think it is running on hybridscape.do i need to make my own server instead of using the one u first start out with?

Read full topic
